meanings.definition: A flat-bottomed pan used for frying food.
meanings.sent1: I cooked eggs in the frypans this morning.
meanings.sent2: My mom bought new frypans for the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The frypans were chatting with the pots about their cooking adventures.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the frypans filled the kitchen with a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The shiny frypans gleamed under the kitchen lights, ready for action.

meanings.sent1: The frypans in the store caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: She owns a collection of frypans in different sizes.
meanings.sent3: The frypans decided to have a race to see who could fry the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The stack of frypans resembled a metallic tower in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of pancakes filled the room as the frypans sizzled happily.
